thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Spider-Man Attempts To Figure Out That Kiss In #12 Marvel Preview
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Spider-Man Attempts To Figure Out That Kiss In #12 Marvel Preview

author: Matthew Mueller
title: EXCLUSIVE: Spider-Man Attempts To Figure Out That Kiss In #12 Marvel Preview
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Spider-Man Attempts To Figure Out That Kiss In #12 Marvel Preview Matthew Mueller Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Things have been a bit complicated for Miles Morales lately. The young hero is just coming off of the chaotic events of the latest superhero Civil War, where he found himself at the center of a heated debate between Captain Marvel, Iron Man, and Captain America. The dust hasn't even settled from that yet and he's already trying to track down his missing father. 
Oh, and throw in trying to figure out just what that kiss with Spider-Gwen means and you've got yourself quite the full plate. In Spider-Man #12 Morales will attempt to balance all of it with the help of his friends of course, and things don't look to be settling down anytime soon. ComicBook.com has an exclusive preview of the new issue, which can be found in the gallery. 
Spider-Man #12 is written by Brian Michael Bendis with art by Sara Pichelli. Gaetano Carlucci is assisting on inks and the book is colored by Justin Ponsor, with VC's Cory Petit on lettering. 
The official description is listed below. 
THIS IS IT! THE MOMENT YOUâ€™VE BEEN WAITING FOR! THE KISS HEARD ROUND THE WORLD! The two most talked about heroes give us something new to talk about in this Spider-Man/Spider-Gwen crossover. How did Miles and Gwen get here?! 
Spider-Man #12 hits comic shops on January 11, 2017.
